parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Sketch relation as defined in swSketchRelationFilterType_e

title: ISketchRelationManager.GetRelationsCount
description: Gets the number of sketch relations in the sketch based on the specified filter.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Sketch relation as defined in swSketchRelationFilterType_e

remarks:
Call this method before calling
ISketchRelationManager::IAddRelation
and
ISketchRelationManager::IGetRelations
to get the size of the array for that method.
